data.liningResistance: Based on corrosion review and cladding corrosion rate assigned. Subject to failure by corrosion.
data.expectedAge: Calculated based on thickness and corrosion rate of cladding/weld overly

data.liningResistance: Subject to failure at seams, particularly on flange faces in high pressure applications. Also subject to failure in areas where plug-welding was used to secure to pressure boundary.

data.linerType: Organic coating—low-quality immersion grade coating (spray applied, to 40 mils)
Organic coating—medium-quality immersion grade coating (filled, trowel applied, to 80 mils)
Organic coating—high-quality immersion grade coating (reinforced, plural applied, > 80 mils)

data.liningResistance: Subject to occasional spalling or collapse
Limited life in highly abrasive service
Complete protection, subject to failure due to thermal or mechanical shock
Partial protection. The brick provides thermal protection but is not intended to keep the fluid away from the base material.
